name: grassy-surge

effect.sun-moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.

short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
